name: ThE K3Ys
description: hi, this is my first try to make a game on my own and partecipating a game jam. This game is made to partecipate on "microstudio game jam 3". It's not a great game, only a little point and click adventure where you have to find three keys to escape from your house while you have panic attack. You have a random timeout every time you start the game, good luck.
